diff_act: 3.inform relevant staff members or patrons about the updates made to the records

regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alert or notification to relevant staff members or patrons after updates have been made to the records.
The system shall trigger an alert or notification to relevant staff members or patrons when a record change is applied.
The system shall trigger an alert or notification to relevant staff members or patrons when a record change is applied.

label: The system shall warn when a record is changed.
absence: action of warning when a record is changed
